headline.main: POST-WAR ECONOMY IN FRANCE STUDIED; Writers There Express Views -- Long Reconstruction and New System Seen

lead_paragraph: VICHY, March 1 -- More and more attention is being given by French financial writers to postwar monetary problems and economics. Some of the questions most discussed are the methods by which the war will be financed, the future of the franc and that of gold.
abstract: French financial writers study post-war monetary and econ problems
